title: Game closes out on Ranked Queue screen, received several time outs for it
body: This has only happened today.  Whenver I double click the check box to enter a match, the client closes.  I've gotten 5 minutes to half hour timeouts due to this.

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons, with factors ranging from your network to programs.  As a first step, remove any apps that interact with league like play.tv as it could be causing crashes like this.  Let me know if that helps! If not, give me some more details like any error messages you might be getting.
